E1.headline: Northern Winds Spirit Festival
E1.desc: Winter is Coming, and the shifting winds come with the migration of the spirits.

E2.headline: Glacier Spirit Festival
E2.desc: Winter is Coming, and the shifting winds come with the migration of the spirits.

E3.headline: Blue Moon Celebration
E3.desc: First New Moon of the Year

E4.headline: Lion Turtle Festival
E4.desc: A day to honour the revered Lionturtle.

E5.headline: Tsungi Horn Awards
E5.desc: Award Ceremony that honors the best talent in the music industry.

E6.headline: Sozin's Comet
E6.desc: A day that celebrates when everything changed, because the Fire Nation attacked.

E7.headline: Dragon Warrior Festival
E7.desc: Festival in honor for Fire Nations best warriors dragons and wagons.

E8.headline: Yangchen Festival
E8.desc: Festival that celeberates the spirit protector Yangchen and Old Iron.

E9.headline: Avatar Day
E9.desc: Festival that celebrates the birth of the Avatar.

E10.headline: Pro-Bending Tournament
E10.desc: Lose in a Pro-bending Tournament, the most popular sport in the World of Avatar.

E11.headline: Pro-Bending Tournament
E11.desc: Win in a Pro-bending Tournament, the most popular sport in the World of Avatar.

E12.headline: Midnight Ang Festival
E12.desc: Non bender revolution against benders, which involves them holding a shyamalamalam at midnight.

E13.headline: Bloodbending Celebrations
E13.desc: Water tribe tradition of celeberating the forbidden art of bloodbending.

E14.headline: Wan Shi Tong Film Festival
E14.desc: Water tribe tradition of celeberating the forbidden art of bloodbending.

E15.headline: Ba Sing Sei Manuscript Convention
E15.desc: Global Festival that showcases the best written work for that year.

E16.headline: Blue Lotus Conference
E16.desc: Annual Blue Conference between leaders of all nations.

E17.headline: Blue Lotus Conference
E17.desc: Annual Blue Conference between leaders of all nations. The Nations left angered.

E18.headline: World Reccord Iceberg!
E18.desc: The Water Tribe released a monstorous iceberg into the sea, causing the world to cool.

E19.headline: Local Earth Benders widen all rivers towards Full Moon Bay.
E19.desc: The Earth benders develop larger rivers for water accesibility for farmers and citizens alike.

E20.headline: Make it Rain!
E20.desc: The Water Tribe honnors an ancient tradition atomizing water into the winds of the world.

E21.headline: Electric Benders At it Again!
E21.desc: Electric benders fill the grid, all combustion generators are shut off.

E22.headline: Powers Out!!
E22.desc: Burn more coal to keep the Nation running.

E23.headline: Tornado?! Blame the Leader!
E23.desc: The capital was hit with a tornado and the citizens blame you.

E24.headline: Sky Bison Mating Season!
E24.desc: The Sky bison begin reproducing, causing a larger methane emission.

E25.headline: Trade Poultry and Livestock
E25.desc: Fire Nations trading livestock bred with other nations. The list includes and is limited to: Dragon Moose, Turtle Duck and Hippo Cow

E26.headline: Trade Precious Metals
E26.desc: Fire Nations starts new trade program, trading precious metals with Earth Kingdom and Water Tribe

E27.headline: Fire Nation picks up production of glass
E27.desc: Fire Lord Elizablaze and Fire Prime Minister Truferno announce additional federal funding to factories involved with manafacturing glass

E28.headline: Fire Nation starts new trade deal with Earth Kingdom
E28.desc: Fire Lord Elizablaze and Fire Prime Minister Truferno announce new trade deal made with Earth President Michelle Rockabma and her cabinet

E29.headline: Uproar in the Fire Nation, as Truferno raises taxes
E29.desc: Truferno intorduces carbon tax to reduce green house gas emissions

E30.headline: Fire Nation starts working on urbanization project
E30.desc: The Fire Nation government launches is it's new 5 year urbanization project, brought about by the rapidly rising population

E31.headline: Inventor from the Fire Nations builds the first automobile engine that runs on fuel
E31.desc: Fire Nation sactioned project to make a more powerful engine than the steam engine comes to fruitition

E32.headline: Coal Mine collapses, 100 miners trapped, 20 dead and counting.
E32.desc: Fire Lord and Prime Minister pool all their resources to save the lives of trapped Coal Miners

E33.headline: Fire Nation trades machines and engines that can be used by non benders
E33.desc: In the midst of tensions boiling between benders and non benders, entrpenuers push for a bill to trade tech used by non benders

E34.headline: Fire Nation experiences Steel Industry Boom with the help of Earth corporate leaders
E34.desc: Promoting Earth Kingdom Corporations in Steel trade

E35.headline: Non bender protest turns violent after police intervention
E35.desc: Riot Control squad was deployed in order to intimidate protesters. Protest turns violent

E36.headline: Trade Poultry and Livestock
E36.desc: Water Tribe trading livestock bred with other nations. The list includes and is limited to: Tiger Seal, Arctic Hen and various forms of fish
